import React, {useContext} from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart-cross_icon.png' const CartItems = () => { const {all_product, CartItems, removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

$100

{removeFromCart()}} alt="" />
{all_product.map((e)=>{ if( CartItems[e.id] > 0){ return } })}
) } export default CartItems
